content.detailedDescription: One night, around 4am, i had a sudden feeling to go to the beach. so i got in my car, barely any gas, i headed out onto the freeway. when i hit the 57 south, i saw four strange red lights waving over the mountain top. then, what looked like stars falling from the sky, turned out to be space ships. the freeway was unusually crowded... all headed towards the beach. the space ships had spotlights, colored rays guiding the cars. i allowed them to guide me after feeling confused and losing sense of direction. they lead me telepathically around strange areas of town. then i went to a small hilltop area where the trees were beautiful. the fog was thick over this nature park sanctuary. it was now 6am, after being asked for a $3.00 entrance fee, i ignored the clerk and drove in without being told anything. i parked next to a pond. then i played my guitar and started to sing. the ufo's seemed to have mental telepathy and told me, "here's a gift for your voice. " i felt a butterfly in my throat as a bird flew above me. then it was like an invisible rain, raining over my head, it seemed to be saying, "the rain forest is over you. please help the earth." as i drove away, the sun was pure gold, no blue. the rays were refined, beautiful. i ran out of gas and a tow truck appeared instantly. the tow truck guy put gas into the gas tank and the engine caught on fire. we had to tow it to the nearest off ramp, where another car of mexican immigrants were fixing their car as well. after talking to each other, we learned that we had had a similar ufo experience.
content.summary: 4 star like ufos

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my porch at above time looked to my right and saw this fast moving ball, very blue in color with white tail just over the trees (30.50ft) in the air going east to west on station ave towards bristol pike.  i thought that it was a meteor.  i followed it from my porch to over the treeline on bristol pike (apprx. 400 600ft).
content.summary: Firey like  sphere blue with white like tails

content.detailedDescription:
I was 9 years old at the time of this sighting.  i was playing a child's game with about 15-20 other kids in the presence of about 10 adults(all women and mothers).  suddenly, one of the kids standing behind me shrieks out, wow. "look at that!"  i turned to look at him as he was frozen pointing towards the west.  (note: i've since been able to calculate certain details like direction from memory.)  i looked in the direction he was pointing and saw what i initially thought was a full moon in the night sky partially obscured by the corner of the apartment building.  there was no movement at this time and as such i returned to look at the boy(richard) who alerted us as if to say o.K. it's a full moon partially obscured by a building.  (at this time it felt like everyone there was moving in unison)  richard at this time re-asserts his position still pointing toward the object and saying "no, look at that ball, look at that thing."  i looked again at the white sphere and as all of us were looking directly at it,  the object slowly moved behind the building and out of sight. (this took about 2 seconds max)  at this point i estimate the sphere to have been no more than 5 ft. in diameter.  everyone there instinctively took off for the corner of the building looking behind it to see where it went.  i've been asked before while recounting this sighting to others why i ran toward this object instead of away from it(in fear).  there was nothing at this point to fear as nothing traumatic had occurred.   if anything this object had just interacted with us by moving out of sight as though it had been seen.  we also looked over a hillside and saw nothing.  this search process may have taken about 4-5 minutes. 
afterwards, all in attendance mulled around processing what it was we had seen.  the adults there were asking richard what he'd seen since he was the first to notice it.  everyone was excited and talking about the "flying saucer" we'd just seen even though it was spheroid in shape.  i heard richard say that the object came from behind the building the same way it moved behind it and he stared at it briefly making sure he was seeing this thing before he alerted everyone else to look at it.
during this time, some of the other kids started throwing rocks over the hillside i guess in an effort to "protect" the neighborhood from this thing that again had demonstrated no hostile action whatsoever.  if anything it was simply observing us.  shortly after these kids started throwing stones over the hillside(maybe 30 seconds in duration), this object rose rapidly from the hillside at what looked like a 45 degree angle at an incredible speed making no noise or sound zig-zagging from: south to north, north to south, south to north, and finally north to south and off into infinity.  it left a trail as a meteor would that dissapated within seconds only this thing was moving up in the sky.  everyone who was there simply stood there momentarily, stunned in wondrous silence knowing we'd just witnessed and interacted with something that definitely came under the category of ufo.
this has remained one of the most powerful and clear memories of my life to date and has stimulated an interest in ufology.  i also know the existence of some form of extraterrestrial life is real.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: The sighting occurred around 9:30p.M. in early august circa 1960 in pittsburgh, pa.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were both woken by loud sound coming from overhead at about 5:40.  the sound resembled a crhoss between a heavenly choir and wind in the wires of many sailboats.  it was not a hum, but more of what one would hear from a mixed choir.  it seemed to come from directly over our house, perhaps coming from the east and heading west towards south puget sound. i went outside to determine the source, but could see nothing.  the sound continued to move and was difficult to pinpoint, but it was overhead.  it blocked out other sounds, i heard no jet aircraft from the local airport, and birds were seen on wires but were silent.  the sound did not seem to bother our dogs.  the sound moved to the sound and was lost in the distance, heading towards gig harbor.  the sky had low cloud cover.  this was not the first time we've heard this same mysterious sound.
content.summary: Loud overhead sound overhead like choir or wind in wires

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my dog about 9:00 pm and i looked up at a pair of stars when i noticed that there was an object moving between the two stars. i followed it for a few seconds then it vanished. about a second or two after it vanished there was an orange/white flash/burst of light. i am pretty sure it was not an airplane because there were planes in the sky before, during and after the sighting. also, there were no blinking lights on the object like there are on airplanes. from where i was standing the object looked like it was about the distant of a star.
content.summary: Saw an object going from south to north. faded away then there was a flash of orange/white light.

content.detailedDescription: 1/2 moon over staten island, looking toward staten island north west from st. george to bayonne new jersey 12 degrees elevation heading north from staten island toward hudson river, slight curve up and down, streek of white light, visable con trail then disappated after a few seconds slight hissing noise. observed while standing on dock near the roll-up door (hypo station, 6700 shore road brooklyn new york. clear night. time was 1:17 am
content.summary: Light white streek (slight con trail) with slight hissing noise.

content.detailedDescription: i was outside skywatching and looking to the southeast area at the right moment, i saw 4 bright white flashes in a row about 1 sec. apart. immediately following the last flash, the other object flashed 2 times with the same intensity and color as the first object. it appeared the first object was leading and the second was to the left 4 inches looking arms length to my finger and either lower or back futher away 3 or 4 inches. nothing else was seen.                                                                                                                                                     one half hour later, i saw a single flash just like the one earlier directly over my head, 3 secs later, it flashed once again, but had moved such a great distance so fast, and was right above the mountian next to rathdrum mt. then it appeared to set down on the top and glow a white light for about 15 mins. along with one now glowing the same way on rathdrum mt. both lights faded out of my sight and nothing else seen. i have already filed with a local field investigator.
content.summary: Objects not visable

content.detailedDescription:
saturday mornings my girlfriend and i walk our airedale (harry) along the east bay shore of san francisco bay. this particular morning i was alone,as my friend had sprained her ankle and could not make the walk. the area is a fairly deserted strip of landfill on the berkeley shoreline surrounded on three sides by water and we walk the several hundred yards out and back.
 approximately half way through the walk i was looking west across the bay and i saw what i first took to be an airplane. it was very high and moving very slowly  ne or ene toward my position. what caught my attention was that i could see no fuselage or tail.I watched carefully for the fuselage as it seemed very strange that it should not have a body. it was silver color,it could be described as a flying wing,but it was flying backwards. as i watched it came nearly vertical over me still very high and then turned and moved back to the southwest.  i had it in view for about 5 to 7 minutes.I moved in a slow meandering way. before i turned back to the northward leg of my walk. as i walked i  turned to watch until i lost it a few minutes later,seeming to blend into the sky. i kept hoping someone else would come by and get to see it too. the one time i was alone out there,and the one time something happens.
content.summary: Directly overhead very high. silver boomerang moving slowly in a random meandering fashion until it disapeared. vee shaped with the apex of the v  away from the direction of travel.

content.detailedDescription: While spreading mulch in my yard, i saw a "cargo" jet banking and looked up to watch it as it passed directly over my house at a pretty low altitude as i assume it was heading to wright pat.  i noticed 3-8 small, round, matallic orbs trailing behind the aircraft "zipping" around, behind, above, and below as the jet passed overhead.  as i stood there not really knowing what i just wittnesed, trying to replay it in my head, and remember what the objects looked like, i shook my head and kinda smiled because i knew my wife would say i'm crazy.  within 5 minutes i heard another jet coming close, so again i look up to see a "bomber" style jet pass over in the same "approach", and again i saw 3 metallic orbs trailing the bomber, zipping around, disappearing, reappearing.  they were following pretty close and at one point it looked as if one if not 2 of the orbs almost attached to the bomber.  after the bomber flew by i took my cell phone out and set it to record and waited.  that is when the fighter jet, (f-16, 15, 18, not sure) went by, i filmed as long as my phone would let me and didnt even realize that i had caught the ufo "on film" until later that night, because as you can see, this one was moving at a pretty good little clip.  if you slow it down, just before it passes under the wing, you can see it "peeking" from behind the cloud, and after it passes under the wing, it can be seen again in the upper left of the screen near another cloud.  whatever "they, it" were or was, could travel at insane speeds.  when the jet was out of sight, so were the sphere shaped things.  i was amazed and excited, along with a little confusion as i have no idea what i witnessed.  i just know we are not alone in the universe.  i am not a fanatic, but i have always said that it is an insult to god to think that we are the only inhabitants in the entire universe.  i would like to know if you guys can clean up the video a bit or have it analyzed to see what you can find.
content.summary: I saw several of these metallic orbs trailing the two previous jets that past by, i filmed this one going very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I never saw anything like it before.  thought a plane may have exploded in the sky, but nothing fell to earth.

the very next evening, on the eleven o'clock news, channel 6 from philadelphia, i heard and saw the exact fireball on t.V.

it was reported that night that on july 1, over the philadelphia area many people reported seeing several fireballs.  they were reported being seen over shopping centers in or near phila.

philadelphia is about eighty miles away from my home and i didn't copy down the places that it was reported to have been seen.

my daughter is a reporter in lancaster, pa., and she told me to call wgal tv in lancaster and report what i saw., which i did.

i looked in our local papers and told only a few neighbors and  my husband, who was sitting with me on our patio but not looking in the snouthwest direction where this odd sight occured.
content.summary: Looked like an explosion.  only for a few seconds.  no noise.  bright fire very high in the sky, nothing fell.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my family were on a camping trip in vermont, i've been going there since i was a kid, and my dad was getting dressed behind his tent and he said sean "look up in the sky" so i looked up and saw something with a lit up whitish cloud or fog around it and from where we were it looked like it was moving slowly around but in just about every direction.  i grabbed the binoculars and watched it and i thought i seen a smaller craft come out of it and go across the sky but it might have been a sattelite my dad said.  we watched it for about thirty minutes until it slowly went away too far to where we couldn't see it anymore.  my dad believed that there was life elsewhere but he never thought that they actually came here until that night.  my dads a pretty smart and rational guy and he said there was just no other explanation for it besides a ufo.  i've always been really interested in that kind of stuff so i was real happy to have been there to see it.  when i look at the picture on my computer and zoom in it looks crazy, you can see the main part then two others running perfectly paralell
 with it.  i think it is all part of the same craft but i'm not sure.  i would like someone elses input e-mailed to me if you could.  thanks
content.summary: It had a whitish lit up cloud around it with the naked eye but in the picture the cloud is not there

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were walking home from the bus stop on mcloughlin blvd. just south of milwaukie heading west through the neighborhood.  we rounded a corner under a dense tree and happened to look up in the sky directly to the west.  it was an extremely clear night; i had my "good" eyeglasses on and my son's vision was 20/10.  we both saw a bright sphere high up, maybe 20,000 ft being chased by what appeared to be a us fighter jet.  the sphere appeared to be in width the same size as the nose of the jet. the sphere was moving erratically, making sharp turns (tighter that 90 degrees) and what appeared to be a laser shot out of the nose of the jet at it; the sphere was easily dodging the laser, which angled out from the jet from directly forward to a 90 degree angle.  i have since seen on tv that the air force has perfected a laser weapon that can rotate on the nose of a fighter jet exactly like the one we saw that night.  it appeared to both of us not to be some kind of military exercise, but it looked like the jet was definitely after the sphere. we eventually lost sight, i believe the jet and whatever the other thing was flew too far away or too high up for us to see anymore.
content.summary: Fighter jet chased erratically moving sphere high up over western oregon

content.detailedDescription:
This past weekend friday night 11:30 pm, i was having a beachfire watching the sky as normal due to preveuos ufo sighting by myself over the past 7 years. so i am watching the sky, when i saw what i believed to be a meteor come down , straight down very fast, and extremely bright. it was very bright white like a meteor. i kept watching expecting it to act as metoers do as they fall. this very bright light kept falling, when all of a sudden it came to a complete stop, and hovered about a mile or so above lake michigan. i continued to watch, then it began to go from left to right, as it manuvered around in a small area, it allmost went in a pattern like a square ...Suttlely left, right, and up and down.
finally after making these turns, acents and decents, it came to a complete stop "hover again" and at a very extreme speed it went out the exact path it came in, it went back up, this object shot out towrds space. going from a very large "fireball" to a ball less than half it original size, finally down to a pin point size, kept going straight up untill it dissapeard into space. from my observation the change in size was due to the extreme distance and speed that it went back into space at. 
i know you guys probably get alot of people making false claims, trying to get on the news, or trying to just get attention. i am 24 years old, i am not seeking fame or recognition at the slightest level. i have lived on lake michigan all 24 years of my life, and in the past seven years i have seen 5 sights of unexplainable crafts. i have never been a skywatcher untill my first sighting over lake michigan august 8th, 2001.
and i know my august 8th sighting was not something with humans in it, the manuvers the craft was doing would kill a person.
this summer i have had two sights in the past month. where i live is directly under the path planes take to the grand rapids air port, ten miles noth is the grand haven air port, and ten miles south is holland air port. i see planes of all shapes and sizes, and i know what air planes look like, especialy their lights at night. air force jets, and coast guard hellicopters fly over daily. these craft were no heeli's or planes. i would love to tell you guys about all of my sighting, i am not a spoof, a mentally disturbed person. i an an honest young man who has seen the things in the sky, that have the same charecteristics as hundreds if not thousands of ufo reports all over the world. i keep what ive seen a secret from a lot of people, and the people i do tell laugh at me, and treat me like im crazy.Well im not crazy, i allmost wish i would have never seen any of them, especially my first sighting. it was scary, yet very intreging. but at the same time it broke my moral and religous fabric of my life. i hate to assume that what i saw was alien, but nothing else explains it? i feel i will never know what ive seen, and thats where people like you come in. we need answeres, we need the truth, and i know that some american out there has it. thanks to all of you, we need many more groups like mufon. god bless+
content.summary: Fireball coming down very fast from space, stopped about 1 mile above lake michigan, hovered and moved from left to right, then shot bake out very fast!

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were heading out to run some errands around 6:30pm yesterday evening. while on route 100 near the acme (byers road), we spotted 2 silver objects in the sky above/in front of us (south of our location). they were moving very quickly across the sky - quicker than jets i have seen.  they seemed to be following each other. they did not appear to be jets, as they left no smoke stream behind them.  we first noticed them glimmering in the sky, then we could tell they were silver as they moved further along. at first we thought they were jets, but as i said they did not have the jet stream and were moving much more quickly then i have ever seen jets fly. the objects eventually moved out of our sight and across the sky.
content.summary: Spotted 2 silver objects moving across the sky, following one another on rt 100 near the acme in chester springs.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i watched the craft for about two hours, from 3:00 to 5:00 am. the object stayed in the same place in the sky for many hours, moving left and right very slowly, back and forth. we watched as the lights flashed on and off, appearing either white, blue, or red. the rate at which the light flashed changed many times, and i got the feeling that it was meant to attract attention. my friend and i both felt very peculiar after watching this craft for a few minutes. i felt as if something was putting pressure on my brain, i am convinced it was reading my thoughts. a very odd feeling took over my entire body leaving me feeling weak and drained, and shaking from head to toe. my friend felt the same way as i when i asked him about the experience. we stopped watching the craft and the feelings that we felt went away almost instantaneously. after a few minutes of viewing the craft again we felt the same weak, quivering tightness in our bodies and felt as though something was reading, or reaching into our minds once again. i have never felt any sensation remotely similar to what i felt that morning. my friend has apparently seen it many times before these past few weeks, though never witnessed it moving before. we lost sight of the object at sunrise.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star like oject moving in the sky with flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: i was on my way home on i35 south on my way home  to  olathe, kansas and in the air i saw this bright star to my left. it followed me, if i would stop it stopped if i drove it would follow me. so after about a half hour i got out of my car and saw a green triangle with white lights around it. then it would change into this green cylinder with triangles  on both ends that were green with lights around it.Then it would go into a white ball like a star. it continued the same pattern over and over again. so i decided to see if it would follow me home and it did, so i took many pictures of it. you see on jan. 10th. 2008 my son and i lost 1 and a half hours of time. so i have gone under hypnosis 4 times and we have found that we were abducted. we ended up on a different highway and in a different town.  i thought both events were cool. i wasn't afraid at all. so it makes everyone  think that i have been abducted before. i didn't lose the object i went inside. it was getting late and i felt exhausted. i don't have the photos off the camera yet that happen s tonight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: on highwasy and followed me home.

content.detailedDescription: So my fiance & his friend were at st.Mikes fair in levittown,pa when his friend stopped to play a shooting game, so i was bored so i just started looking around & i looked right at this orange/white streak going across horizontally, i thought it can't be a plane because it has no contrail behind it & maybe it was a meteor though. i did tell my fiance & his friend to look but it was so fast they couldn't spot it in time & i was like oh wait till it comes out the other side of the clouds & then you'll see it, but it never did, weird !!! & now i just read someone else's story in pa, they saw what i saw but on a different day,somewhere else, so i had to write this in !!!! thankyou
content.summary: I was at st.Mikes fair in levittown, pa with 2 other people when i looked up & saw bright organge/white streak no contrail, never came out the other side of the clouds

content.detailedDescription: So my fiance & his friend were at st.Mikes fair in levittown,pa when his friend stopped to play a shooting game, so i was bored so i just started looking around & i looked right at this orange/white streak going across horizontally, i thought it can't be a plane because it has no contrail behind it & maybe it was a meteor though. i did tell my fiance & his friend to look but it was so fast they couldn't spot it in time & i was like oh wait till it comes out the other side of the clouds & then you'll see it, but it never did, weird !!! & now i just read someone else's story in pa, they saw what i saw but on a different day,somewhere else, so i had to write this in !!!! thankyou
content.summary: I was at st.Mikes fair in levittown, pa with 2 other people when i looked up & saw bright organge/white streak no contrail, never came out the other side of the clouds

content.detailedDescription: First i would like to say that i am a college educated police officer. i am also an avid military aircraft enthusiast. i work in the lower area of bucks county pa. i do not have the specific date and time of the event, but i know it was in late may of this year. i will have to check my police report for exact time and date. our department received a few calls in regard to the object in the sky. the event took place around dusk. there was still a good amount of light in the sky and the object could be easily seen. the object appeared due east of newtown pa. i would say that it appeared to be hovering over the area of i-95 and rt 332, if i had to guess, but the distance could have been further or closer because i couldn't really determine the size of the object as it was like nothing i had ever seen in the sky. the object appeared to be shaped like a comma, but sideways. the curved, fat end of the comma appeared to be larger than a regular comma shape. the object appeared to turn in place and this shifted the shape of the object. the object would rise suddenly higher and move slightly side to side, similar to a helicopter, but the movement was faster than a traditional helicopter.. the object did not have any audible noise coming from it. my first impression was that this was something i had never seen before. it appeared to shutter while moving, almost vibrating, which i thought was strange because i could see this action from quite a distance. after several minutes the object began to descend slightly and drop below the tree line only to re-emerge about a minute later. i attempted to drive toward the object following an eastbound route and noticed that the object began to descend very quickly toward a tree line in the distance and disappeared. there were no helicopters in the area covering any news events. as an aircraft enthusiast i have seen many helicopters in flight. this was no helicopter. it also did act like any jet or prop aircraft i have ever seen. i work in area where military bases are nearby. i have seen and can name just about every aircraft. this was like nothing i have seen from any military craft. i am reporting this to your agency because i have heard that other bucks county communities nearby have experienced unidentified objects in the sky. i have never seen anything like what i saw before or since.
content.summary: Appeared to be black and shaped like a comma, only sideways

content.detailedDescription: I was working the night shift at good samaritan nursing home located on e 6th st., alliance, ne.  i began taking my break at 3am, outside in the inner courtyard - it was the third week of june, the middle of a heat wave, and despite the fact it just finished raining, i was sweating profusely, so i was drinking iced tea.  i was sitting on a bench, facing north, and the rain clouds had just broken and were moving westward - leaving the eastern half of the night sky clear.  my break was almost over and as i stood up, i stretched, looking upwards and that's when i noticed a "v" formation of 6 amber "oval-shaped" lights coming out of the clouds - they were traveling from west to east.  i was immediately overcome with a mixture of strong feelings - "wonder", "awe", and a feeling that i was seeing something more amazing than i had ever seen before.  at first i had an impulse to run inside and bring out another witness, but i quickly rejected that idea because what i was seeing was so amazing, i didn't want to take my eyes away and "miss" any part of it - plus i was afraid that it would all be over by the time i returned.  so i continued to observe, when suddenly, 3 of the "lights" (2 on one side and 1 on the other side - the last ones of the trailing "v" arms) all switched positions with each other in a "blink of an eye".  i liken it to the way "checkers" jump position - if you understand what i'm saying.  after that i knew that type of lateral move was impossible by anything i knew about.  after that the "formation" continued heading eastward briefly, but then angled upwards, and away from earth, then they all accelerated at a speed i couldn't even guess, and were gone in a flash.  i stood there, completely dumbfounded, and i remember thinking that so far there had been no noise of any kind - i thought if i stood there and waited a while longer, that i should be able to hear any type of engine noise "following" the flight - if they had been traveling faster than the speed of sound.  i waited for at least a couple minutes - but no sound was ever heard.  afterwards i ran inside and tried to report what i saw to the charge nurse, but she thought i was just trying to play some kind of joke - unfortunately, i had a reputation for practical jokes and keeping our shift laughing and in good spirits.  afterwards, i talked quietly with another co-worker - a rancher's wife who had lived in the nebraska panhandle all her life.  she seemed to believe me, but she advised me to keep my observation to myself - if i wanted to be taken seriously.  she went on to say that she had witnessed many "strange things" in her lifetime - as had many of her friends and family out in that part of the country - but they held on to a tradition of just not discussing such things publicly.  so i then went back and recanted my story to the charge nurse - however, over the years, i have told this story to members of my family and trusted friends.  that part of the country is very deserted - the night sky is beautiful, the milky way is visible.  i was amazed that when i checked out the mufon "weather maps" that entire part of the country - the area where i would have guessed the highest amount of sightings - actually has the lowest, almost non-existant.
content.summary: A "v" formation of 6 oval-shaped "lights" came out of the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were out on the street and we heard a big loud vooom like a jet.We were singing and all of a sudden we saw a black bird fly by then all of a sudden a huge big black circle(there was light poles around us)  then we ran inside cuz we had to tell are mom.And then went outside agan and the same thind happend to us but we were in our driveway and saw it again then then went inside again then went back to see if it would happen again but notthing happend.It looked liike a huge dark spot around us but it came so quick we couldnt look up to see it it felt like all the lights were off and we thought we were asleep and we didn't rember eneything after.
content.summary: Big large circle very dark

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were out on the street and we heard a big loud vooom like a jet.We were singing and all of a sudden we saw a black bird fly by then all of a sudden a huge big black circle(there was light poles around us)  then we ran inside cuz we had to tell are mom.And then went outside agan and the same thind happend to us but we were in our driveway and saw it again then then went inside again then went back to see if it would happen again but notthing happend.It looked liike a huge dark spot around us but it came so quick we couldnt look up to see it it felt like all the lights were off and we thought we were asleep and we didn't rember eneything after.
content.summary: Big large circle very dark

content.detailedDescription: Two times earlier that night, between midnight and 3, i saw the same disc twice at least 30 minutes apart. i was with a group of friends who witnessed this bright light in the sky zig zagging up and down and back and forth, and then it zipped out of sight behind some trees. we continued doing our late night yard work and it showed up again, it moved the same way and left sight the same way.
content.summary: Many sightings in one night

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on the phone just looking up and at the corner of my eye i see a star like object glide across the sky but in a it looks like  at first maybe even a plane until i notice it is zig zagging luckily my sister in law was droping trash in the can and i showed her.Then she went to get my brother who had missed it the first sighting but came out again and witnessed the second one about an hour later he witnessed two following each other in the same zig zag pattern also after we could no longer see them in the direction the left small burst of light in the area of departure.As the night went on we could see planes as well but they were bigger and we could see the speed difference from the objects we had seen.
content.summary: Short zig zag flight across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I saw that the sun looked really strange through the smoke of the california fires so i grabbed my camera to take some pics to send to my brother via the web. i took about 8 shots before calling it good because
im not that good of a photographer and i wanted to pick the best of the bunch to send. after downloading them to my computer i went in to preview 
them in more of a closeup format. the first pic had nothing but the red sun
and the sky and trees.The second pic which i took about 2 sec's after the first had a tube like thing hovering close to the sun. the third pic once again had nothing but the sky and setting sun and again it was taken about 2 sec's after the previous one. so within a few seconds it came and went.
i am not one to make up stories,nor do i go out of my way to bother people uselessly but i remembered your commercial and thought you might be interested in at least taking a look at it and maybe letting me know what you think.
sincerely. dale h herring.

p.S. i was at home when this occured.I am sending the first three pics in 
the order that i took them. look very closely at the 2nd one close to the 
sun.
content.summary: I did'nt even know it was there till i took a close up look at the photo

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the garbage to the road when i happened to check out the night sky.  there is very little light interference where i live so you can see all of the stars on a clear night.  something caught my attention out of the corner of my eye.  in the north east part of the sky, very high above the horizon, there was this oblong object moving to the south, very slowly.  at first i thought it might of been a helicopter, but there were no navigation lights blinking. it was coming closer to my posistion when it seemed to stop and just hover.  then from the east i heard the definite sound of a jet.  pensacola naval air station is close by and they fly jets over our area on a regular basis.  with the oncoming jet i figured the object was just part of an excercise.  but when the jet got directly over me i galnced at the object and it was no longer there.  so i watched the jet, it seemed to be doing high speed manuveurs.  after about five minutes, the jet headed south at a high rate of speed.  then almost directly above me, high in the sky, the object flickered for a few seconds then was fully visible.  it began moving towards the south.  as it passed to where i could see the back of the object i could definitely some kind of bluish exhaust exiting from the rear.  it began moving faster, than with a bright flash of blue light, it zipped towards the south in the blink of an eye and was gone.  i waited a little while longer and neither the object or the jet returned.  i was really excited about what i witnessed.  maybe it was a new plane they are testing at the air base.  or maybe it was something else.  either way i've been looking skyward since.  i hope this can help in your research.  thank you for your time!  i have ten minutes of video footage but the file is too big to transfer to my computer.  although it only shows static, i didn't know if you may have a test you can run to find what caused the interference.
content.summary: Hovering bright cigar shaped object.  visual blue exhaust, no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
i went outside (22:30-22:45, 1 july 08) to have a smoke and looked up to the sky, as i always do.  i quickly noticed what i thought was a shooting star and said to my friend, while pointing at it, "look a shooting star". (the object was  approximately 25-35 deg. above the horizon traveling from east to west, about the brightness of a medium star, it did not twinkle and had no trail, kind of like a sattelite but moved much faster, no blinking lights or aviation lighting, we were in east central phoenix looking south-southwest,  it was a clear night) my friend aknowledged also seeing it and as we both were looking it the object made a "sideways u-turn" completely reversing direction, now traveling from west to east, then we lost it. we both looked at eachother in amazement saying "did you just see that?"  yes infact we both did. we turned off all outdoor lights and in 2-3 min. saw it come back, now from the east going back west, and lower on the horizon 15-20 deg. we stood there not beliving our eyes and watched this starlike object fly all over the sky, staying  5-25 deg. off the horizon moving in every direction possible,using 80-90deg. laterally and being able to vary its speed and direction at will.  it could change direction with out slowing down. we watched it do this for about 30 min. then lost it. we called out my friends room mate to have him take a look and in about 5 min. the object reappeared. i don't think he belived what we were telling him until he saw it for himself.  sure enough though he did see it.(one of the guys there described it like a bee flying, i would agree except it never appeard to hover, it was always in motion but very much like the flight path of an insect a gnat maybe)  as all three of us are wacthing a second one appears. they were not flying in any type of formation but it was evident that they were quite aware of eachother.  darting adround in the sky sometimes paralelle to one another, somtimes opposite directions, sometimes trailing eachother, sometimes doing their own thing.  there was no rhyme nor reason to their movments.  their movement would go in a straight line then change direction, then speed change, then zig-zag, then speed again, then straight line again ect., not keeping any patterns or staying concistant however it was all done very smoothly and what seemed to be very percise manuvering.  we watched the two do  this for  about 45 nim. then the thrird one appeared. same in every way as the first two. all three were visible in the sky for about another 25-30 min., then it dropped down to two. our last sighting was at 01:15, 2 july 08. during this whole period of time we were never out of veiw of at least one and if you lost it could find it again or multiple ones in less than 1 or 2 min. we would see them for minutes at a time and multiple times over 10 min. straight.  
  i saw this object do things that are not possible to do and have no explination for what i(we) saw.  for the record i have never in 30yrs of looking up at the sky ever seen anything even close to this.  i am a profesional instructor pilot(for a major airline) with over 2000 hrs of flight time (over 400 night).  i know what aicraft, sattelites, flares, flares on chutes, and most anything you can think of that flies looks like and how they move through the sky. this was none of those. these objects manuvered like nothing i've ever seen. while watching we started timing it between 2 points compared to aircraft were saw transitioning the area in the same direction(the aircraft were on jet routes, those start at 19,000 ft. msl and usually top out around 30,000 ft. msl) the aircraft would take about 20 sec and the things we saw could do it in 3 or 4 sec.  they could also go slow.  we saw one pace an aircraft(passenger jet) for several sec the star object was in front by a few miles then all of the sudden accelerated away, quadrupling its distance in 1-2 sec., then "pulled up" making that "u-turn", then went right over the airplane, pushed down  "u- turn" and now right behind the aircraft. it only did the once but also did many other weird and crazy manuvers sometimes looking as though the two star objects would collide with eachother then not at the very last sec.  
  ok...   so now can someone tell me what the hell we saw??
content.summary: Star-like object/objects south of phoenix, arizona

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at 9:50 on thurs july 02. traveling south on i 95 from bucks county to philly. i noticed what seemed to be the ussual air traffic in the area.(two large airports are close by).  high above the normal traffic  i saw a redish orange light fall from very high.  i thought to myself,  cool i don't often get to see a shooting star.  as i watched this object at some point it started to travel horizontally and was no longer falling. looking at the road and back up at the sky the object moved pretty fast changeing direction once.  the object appearered to be over nj on the other side of the delaware river. and just that fast while i was starring at it the object dissapereared.  it was like turning off a light switch and i could not see it anymore it was gone.  i felt like i had just witnesed something extrodinary, about 30 seconds later the object reappereared  on the pa side of the river. the red/orange object hovered around for about another minute, then the light went out again. i believe that the object never left ,  it just turned out its lights. i am a little confused about what i saw, i felt  that the object did not want to be detected and that has left me feeling a little nervous.  if anyone saw something like this in our area, please respond here.
content.summary: Driving south on i 95 from bucks county to philadelphia, i thought i saw a star falling but realized it was moving horizontally. red orange light like a fire moving in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was late summer late one night i was watching tv in our sun room with the windows open. i saw a streak of light, i say streak but it was a solid straight line very white, in the sky. i thought it was a jet contrail in the moon light, it was full in the east at about 60ish degrees, but as it slowly "drifted" it became bighter, not disipating like a contrail does. so i got up and went outside to get a better look probably smoke too. i notice after a few secs it was comming from an aircraft heading between me and the moon. it was hazy out, a low thin cloud, so i could see the shadow of it as it was kinda back lit but still in the fog. i yelled for my mom, yes i had a roommate at my mid 20's so what! she was scared something happened to me so she came running! i was yelling come here look as she got there it was in full view. i shut up so we could listen and .... nothing. she was looking at a huge at least 2000ft possibly much larger, im good with distance and my depth perception is exceptional i just want you to know it was at least 2000ft, anyway cigar shaped thing with a briliant beam of light comming out the front. with the moon full and the light fog you could plainly seeit. we ran to the front and watched it go by. i called our local airport and asked had she seen anything. it came from that general direction and they are only 10miles away as the crow flies. so they didn't have anyflights or anything and checked with the ft. gordon army base about 30 miles further. so not 15 min after we hang up we talked about 15 min about it a damn transport army plane with all it lights on flying low as hell came right over my house. at the time there was never any air trafic over our side of the river. well i think they did it to quell any questions with a "yes" we were doin shit".

we, my mom and me, also saw 15 plus years earlier a saucer 100ish ft dia. over the town with colored lights going around it. swear to whom ever!
content.summary: ¬Ω mile or bigger cigar shaped moving quietly with bight light "beam"

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from the king of prussia area last june going to reading on route 422. june 2007. it was late june i believe june 30th. i was driving around 12:30am from montgomery county to my home in berks county. as i was driving towards the limerick area on 422 i saw a strange light towards the right of the highway, where the limerick powerplant is. it was dark out, but i always look at limerick powerplant because of it's size and i moved to berk county a year before and still am not used to seeing this giant powerplant near the highway.
at first i thought it was a plane fyling low, seeing i am told there is a airport right near there. but what struck me as unusal was the object was very low and flying about the height of powerlines and flying beside and lower then the height of the powerplant. the closer i got to the object as i drove on 422 and got closer. ( the area of 422 curves around and gets closer to the powerplant area) the more i realized it wasnt a plane but a ufo.
it wasnt flying fast or high. as high as those high powerlines over highways. it was fyling along side the powerlines  very close. the whole experience lasted about 2 minutes from me first seeing it until i got closer to it , until it passed over me and over 422 and i continued to drive on 422.
it looked like a drone craft or something.
at first when i saw it these thoughts came into my head.
the first thing i thought was it looked like something out of star wars.
it was low enough that i could clearly see it and know it was nothing of this world, or at least nothing that any civilians have seen.
the other things i thought about were:
why is this thing flying along side the powerlines.
the ufo made no noise whatsoever.
i passed the area where the powerlines and overpass are on the highway of 422 headed west the same exact time the ufo flew over 422 going across.
it was only as high as powerlines and made no noise whatsoever.
it silently glided through the air.
it was round and had several lights in the center. like 3 infront. and had these weird side wings. it looked like only one wing on the side. to the left side of the circle center. it would actually be the right side of the ufo but coming towards me headed over route 422 it was on the left side of the craft.
i dont know anything really about ufo's so my descriptions are out of sci-fi movies. the first thing that came into my mind when i saw it and realized it wasnt a plane when i was close enough was it was a ufo and looked like something out of star wars. then the words i've heard before drone, just came to mind.
small, one wing, round with lights, slowly gliding rather low, with no sound.
i told family and friends, and everyone believed me.
i was freaked out when i was driving afterwards, and immediatley called various family members on my cell as soon as i passed it on the highway.
that's how unnerved i was.
when i got home i hardly slept at all and was very freaked as i know it was no plane.
i have wanted to report this story for a while but didnt know where to report it or what sites are out there. this was just about a year ago.
about 3-4 months ago i saw a news story on aol of a ufo and a picture of it a guy had caught on film in broad daylight over a light post/powerline and it was featured on aol. as soon as i saw it online i realized it looked very simular to what i saw at night here in pa last june.
then i heard on the news people seeing ufo's in pa the past couple of days and found this site.
i still wonder if anyone else drving on 422 last year in late june saw this same ufo as there were a few other cars driving west bound while i was.
content.summary: I was driving on 422 passing limerick area around 12:30am in june 2007 and saw a ufo moving very slowly  towards the highway from the right, level with powerlines and parrell to limerick powerplant. it was low enough that i saw it very clear
